code: import React from"react";import classNames from"classnames";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const COLUMNS=[1,2,3];export const VuiGrid=_ref=>{let{children,columns=2,spacing="m",className,...rest}=_ref;const classes=classNames("vuiGridContainer",className);const contentClasses=classNames("vuiGrid",`vuiGrid--${spacing}`,`vuiGrid--columns${columns}`);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes,...rest,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:contentClasses,children:children})});};
